content.rendered:
Play Octagon : Great 3D Perception Game

The task in today’s game will be to avoid various holes and get as far as possible. The whole game offers 1 game mode. It’s an endless mode, so you’ll be playing all the time. Get the ball to the goal. The level is generated automatically and is constantly changing, so you need to adjust to it. Also, the speed increases and the game will become more and more challenging.

Race to the End in Octagon , move fast or be left behind! Play the minimal arcade game on your Web Browser, iPhon or Android.

How far can you go?

Controls : Arrow keys – Movement
